Content.Title: Winter At Badger
Content.Abstract: Winter At Badger is an exciting time where families, friends, church youth groups, etc. may schedule overnight or day use of our facilities. Cost is determined by the type of group scheduling and also the type of facility used. Sledding is a popular sport at Badger during the winter, as is cross country skiing.
Content.BodyCopy:
New Winter Pricing and Guidelines at Badger Creek

Sled Hill/Rope Tow Cost

Group Pricing:

  • Rental of the sled hill is $80

Sledding Guidelines & Tips

  • Weekday Hours - The sled hill is available on Monday - Friday starting at 4 - 9 p.m.* (for a 4 hour block).

Weekday Example:

4 p.m.  - Arrival, walk up to the sled hill, and orientation

4:30 p.m.  - Rope tow starts

9 p.m.  - Rope tow Shuts off

  • Saturday Hours - The sled hill is open for two 3 hour blocks; One in the morning 9 a.m. - 12 noon one from 2 - 5 p.m. and one from 6 - 9 p.m.
Saturday Example:

9 a.m. - Arrival, walk to the sled hill, and orientation

9:30 a.m.  - Rope tow starts

12 noon -  Rope tow shuts off

  1. Be on time for your scheduled sledding time. The sled hill runs on a three hour block (30 minutes for arrival, orientation, and to walk to the sled hill). Because of other schedule conflicts, we cannot run the rope tow later to make up for a late arrival.
  2. Smaller families are encouraged to combine with one or two other families to alleviate the burden of the tow rental.
  3. Sledding participants are expected to follow all guidelines and to take home with them all their garbage including broken sleds.
  4. Sledding participants must sign a waiver and present it to the Badger staff upon arrival.

What Is offered at Badger Creek during the winter?

  • Sled Hill with Rope Tow
  • Cross Country Skiing

A sled hill and rope tow are available. For questions on cost and availability and to schedule Badger, please call (208) 456-2531.

Cross Country ski trails are groomed at Badger and are free of charge. You do not have to schedule the Cross Country ski trails, but everything else needs to be scheduled and paid for in advance of use.

Note: Scheduling for December  2011 and January to March 2012 use will begin on Monday, October 3, 2011, at 9 a.m. Please call (208) 456-2531.

Note: In order to use the sled hill and facilities at Badger Creek, each member of your group must sign a liability waiver (see link to right). Print off a form for each member of your group. If under 18, a parent or guardian must sign the form. The forms must be given to the person in charge at Badger Creek in order to participate.
